mapper.select: select c.*,d.cook_num,d.cook_db from recipe c inner join (select a.* from cook_image a inner join (select recipe_num,min(cook_num) min from cook_image group by recipe_num) b on a.cook_num = b.min) d on c.recipe_num = d.recipe_num

select a.recipe_num,a.recipe_title,a.recipe_content,a.recipe_time,a.recipe_best,b.cook_db,b.material_name from recipe a inner join (select e.cook_db,e.cook_num,f.material_name,f.recipe_num from (select a.* from cook_image a inner join (select recipe_num,min(cook_num) min from cook_image group by recipe_num) b on a.cook_num = b.min) e inner join material f on e.recipe_num = f.recipe_num) b on a.recipe_num = b.recipe_num where a.recipe_time <= ${time} and b.material_name = '${material}'
